name: Johnny Ricochet
description:
In a city controlled by the italian mafia, a retired private detective will face the ghosts of his past. Will Johnny Ricochet be able to survive for another day? Will he be consumed by vengeance? Or will he be consumed by whiskey?

Warning: the game is in Spanish and does not have an English translation. This game was made in 2019 by Black Hat Studios.

Our amazing team:

  • Alberto Alegre
  • Arnau Tarragó
